name: Video
description: Play back a video in the project.

conditions.name: Is playing
conditions.description: True if video is currently playing.

conditions.name: Is paused
conditions.description: True if video is currently paused.

conditions.name: Has ended
conditions.description: True if video has finished playing.

conditions.name: Is muted
conditions.description: True if video sound is muted.

conditions.name: On playback event
conditions.description: Triggered when a playback event occurs.

params.name: Event
params.description: The playback event to check for.

actions.name: Set playback time
actions.description: Set the current playback time in seconds.

params.name: Time
params.description: Playback time in seconds to seek to.

actions.name: Set looping
actions.description: Set whether the video loops when it reaches the end.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether or not the video should loop when it reaches the end.

actions.name: Set muted
actions.description: Set whether the audio is muted.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether or not the audio should be muted.

actions.name: Set volume
actions.description: Set the volume of the accompanying audio.

params.name: Volume
params.description: The volume of the audio to set, in dB attenuation.

actions.name: Play
actions.description: Start playing the video if stopped or paused. On mobile, may only work in a user input trigger.

actions.name: Set playback rate
actions.description: Set how fast the video plays, as a multiplier of its original speed.

params.name: Rate
params.description: The playback rate to set. 1 is original speed, 2 is double speed, etc.

actions.name: Set source
actions.description: Switch to a different video. This does not automatically start playing it.
actions.display_text: Set video primary source [i]{0}[/i] ({1}), secondary source [i]{2}[/i] ({3})

params.name: Primary source
params.description: File name of primary video source to use if supported.

params.name: Primary format
params.description: The container format and video codec of the primary source.

params.name: Secondary source
params.description: File name of secondary video source to use if the primary format is not supported.

params.name: Secondary format
params.description: The container format and video codec of the secondary source.

expressions.name: Duration
expressions.description: Video duration in seconds, if known.

expressions.name: Volume
expressions.description: Current video volume in dB attenuation.

expressions.name: VideoWidth
expressions.description: The width of the source video.

expressions.name: VideoHeight
expressions.description: The height of the source video.

expressions.name: PlaybackRate
expressions.description: Current playback rate, 1 being normal speed.
